Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2007 07:22PM marytjam wrote: Bimmer, brother, husband, son, father, grandfather, lover, heart breaker...you are a dear sweet soul. Diane surely knows how much you love her and now she is out of pain, free from suffering, and watching over you.  please take gentle care of yourself.  Hugs to you, C,K,C,J&G. your sister mary
Posts.Title: Very advanced B.C.: Diane's final gift. Bimmer ilenee

Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2007 05:23PM marytjam wrote: Chuck, I have sent your editorial to the Atlanta Journal with your contact information. The form said there was a 150 word limit but we'll see what they say.  There are a lot of people here who know you and love you, and many who would just benefit from what you have put into words.  Love and tears,  Your sister Mary
